MEDIUM_PRIORITY - Static variable in class jpo.ThumbnailCreationQueue
a constant to indicate a medium priority
MINI_INFO - Static variable in class jpo.ThumbnailDescriptionJPanel
Constant that indicates that the descriptions should be formatted as a small info panel meaning small font and much information

the main method is the entry point for this application (or any) Java application.

the dimensions of the main frame

height of specific size window

width of specific size window

mainY - Variable in class jpo.SettingsDialog
y coordinates of top left corner of main window

The maximum number of pictures to keep in memory

The maximum size a picture is zoomed to.

memorizeCopyLocation(String) - Static method in class jpo.Settings
This method memorizes the copy targets so that they can be accessed more quickly next time round.

This method memorizes the recent drop targets so that they can be accessed more quickly next time round.

model - Variable in class jpo.TableMap
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class jpo.CleverJTree.MyPopupListener
If the mouse was clicked more than once using the left mouse button over a valid picture node then the picture editor is opened.

Override the mouseReleased event.

Method that moves a node down one position

Method that moves a node to the bottom of the current branch
moveNodeToTop() - Method in class jpo.SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode
Moves a node to the top of it's branch.
moveNodeUp() - Method in class jpo.SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode
Moves a node up one position in the current branch.

method to move any file from a source location to a target location.
